Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HYDRASHIFT 2/4 daratumumab kit for qualitative detection of monoclonal proteins in human serum using immunofixation electrophoresis
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of monoclonal proteins in human serum by immunofixation electrophoresis in conjunction with HYDRAGEL IF kits and HYDRASYS 2 apparatus, enabling visual evaluation of monoclonal proteins in patients who have received daratumumab therapy
